metadata.subject: France. Armée. Garde nationale
Festivals
metadata.title: Procès-verbal de la Confédération des François, a Paris : le quatorze juillet mil sept-cent-quatre-vingt-dix
metadata.creator: Lottin, Augustin-Martin, 1726-1793, printer
Lottin de Saint Germain, Jean-Roch, b. 1754, printer
Carbier, former owner. ICN
metadata.publisher: A Paris : Chez J.-R. Lottin, imprimeur-libraire-ordinaire de la ville, rue S.-André-des-Arcs (no 27),
metadata.description: Colophon: De l'imprimerie de Lottin l'aîne, & J.-R. Lottin, imprimeurs de la ville, rue S.-André-des-Arcs, (no 27), 1791 [i.e. 1790?]
Proceedings, decrees, and letters dated July 10-24, 1790, regarding planned festivities for the Fête de la Féderation on July 14, 1790
"Liste de Messieurs les gardes-nationales élus députés a la fédération": p. 33-96
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Title is on the cover page. Uneven binding. Skewed text. Damaged, stained and/or loose pages.
